function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased covid-19 transmission due to lifting eviction moratoria","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excess infections due to backlog of cases and economic duress","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to legal representation in eviction cases","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of health care access and medical debt","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased housing precarity among low-income risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey revealing inadequate conditions in multi-family housing in podgorica","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient role of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in building facilities and overcrowding","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate user participation in the
